title: Rewriting into an equation
text: The function can be rewritten as $$-\left(\frac{1}{2}\right) {\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)}^{\left(-7\right)}+6$$
speech: The function can be rewritten as  minus 1 half times parentheses 1 half  raised to the parentheses negative 7  power plus 6
pacedSpeech: The function can be rewritten as   minus 1 half times  1 half  raised to the  negative 7  power plus 6
